channel.title: Problem with mining!
channel.description:
I've added a mining place in my server, all the rock and that... But when I click on the rocks only Tin mith and admin mines :mad: and I've tried holding the pick axe and having it in my invontorey :confused: Does eny on know how to fix this problem Thanks alot for taking the time to read this.
More thanks if you help! ;D ;D
